title: Etheriya Market Capitalization Tops $748,819.00 (RIYA)
content: Etheriya (CURRENCY:RIYA) traded 2.6% higher  against the dollar during the one day period ending at 17:00 PM Eastern on May 18th. Over the last seven days, Etheriya has traded 6.2% higher  against the dollar. Etheriya has a total market cap of $748,819.00 and $0.00 worth of Etheriya was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. One Etheriya token can now be purchased for about $0.47 or 0.00006197 BTC on popular exchanges including Cryptopia and  CoinExchange.    Here is how related cryptocurrencies have performed over the last 24 hours:    Get Etheriya alerts:     Ripple (XRP) traded up 4.4% against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008401 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded up 4% against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003897 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded up 1.1% against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024703 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded up 5.2% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0608 or 0.00000796 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded 4% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $56.65 or 0.00741648 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded 0.1% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $1.00 or 0.00013107 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded up 10.3% against the dollar and now trades at $3.74 or 0.00048910 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded 4.4% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $14.63 or 0.00191582 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded up 9.4% against the dollar and now trades at $7.70 or 0.00100748 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded 7.4% higher  against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001546 BTC.   Etheriya Token Profile      Etheriya’s launch date was June 19th, 2017. Etheriya’s total supply is 1,861,531 tokens and its circulating supply is 1,581,531 tokens. The official website for Etheriya is etheriya.com . Etheriya’s official Twitter account is @RealEtheriya .    Etheriya Token Trading    Etheriya can be purchased on these cryptocurrency exchanges:  CoinExchange and Cryptopia.  It is usually not currently possible to purchase alternative cryptocurrencies such as Etheriya directly using US dollars. Investors seeking to trade Etheriya should first purchase Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in US dollars such as Gemini, GDAX or Changelly. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to purchase Etheriya using one of the exchanges listed above.
